law.history: Amended 2009 Ky. Acts ch. 99, sec. 3, effective July 1, 2009. -- Amended 2007 Ky. Acts ch. 141, sec. 17, effective July 1, 2007. -- Amended 2005 Ky. Acts ch. 85, sec. 595, effective June 20, 2005; and ch. 168, sec. 129, effective March 18, 2005. -- Created 2004 Ky. Acts ch. 79, sec. 1, effective July 1, 2005.
